name: OB_HSB_DEL_CMPLCTN
description: This table contains information about the complications encountered during the delivery for this pregnancy.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the episode record (HSB .1).

columns.name: OB_DEL_COMPLIC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the diagnosis which is associated with a complication that arose during delivery. This column may be linked to DX_ID in table CLARITY_EDG to obtain more specific information about the diagnosis.
